titleInfo.title: Jenny Lewis at the Ryman Auditorium

mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing Jenny Lewis's Rabbit Fur Coat Ten Year anniversary tour with The Watson Twins and M. Ward at the Ryman Auditorium on February 6. Poster features a woodcut of Jenny Lewis wearing a fur coat and pulling a wagon with a rabbit wearing a top hat sitting in it.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
